content:
# II edition of the competition to award funds for internship trips for doctoral students studying at the AGH Doctoral School in 2025. -- AGH University Doctoral School 

URL: https://www.sd.agh.edu.pl/en/news/detail?tx_news_pi1%5Baction%5D=detail&tx_news_pi1%5Bcontroller%5D=News&tx_news_pi1%5Bnews%5D=1197&cHash=bcc80a6ca34e5761a7c17b7e44ea48f0
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:21:57

II edition of the competition to award funds for internship trips for doctoral students studying at the AGH Doctoral School in 2025. 

 11-03-2025 

The Director of the AGH Doctoral School announces 
the second edition of the competition to award funds for internship trips to foreign research centers
 for doctoral students studying at the AGH Doctoral School in 2025.

The competition is announced within the framework of the implementation of the program 
"STER NAWA - internationalization of doctoral schools"
 funded by the 
National Agency for Academic Exchange.

Applications should be submitted in original to the AGH Doctoral School office (building A3, room 118) until 
April 8, 2025 at 1pm.

All details about the competition you can find 
HERE.

Back
